descriptionHtml:
Just a simple retexture of the Dragonscale set (male and female) with a rock texture. Nothing fancy.

Why? - Why not?
Don\'t like it? I don\'t care much, don\'t download it and move along.

[color=darkorange]Installation:[/color]
Use NMM to install or extract the archive to your Skyrim folder, click yes to merge folders.

To uninstall, just remove the files:

/textures/armor/dragonscale/armor.dds
/textures/armor/dragonscale/armorf.dds
/textures/armor/dragonscale/boots.dds
/textures/armor/dragonscale/gloves.dds
/textures/armor/dragonscale/helmet.dds
/textures/armor/dragonscale/shield.dds

Enjoy!
author: eSoDian
